text: Your Honor, I am Joseph Wilson.

text: - Go on.- I know that by coming here...

text: ...I saved the lives of these 22 people.
title: Fury

text: But that isn't why I'm here. I don't careanything about saving them.
title: Fury

text: They're murderers. I know the lawsays they're not because I'm still alive.

text: But that's not their fault.
title: Fury

text: And the law doesn't know that a lot ofthings that were very important to me...
title: Fury

text: ...silly things, maybe,like a belief in justice...
title: Fury

text: ...and an idea that men were civilized...
title: Fury

text: ...and a feeling of pride that this countryof mine was different from all others.

text: The law doesn't know those things wereburned to death within me that night.
title: Fury

text: I came here today for my own sake.
title: Fury

text: I couldn't stand it anymore.
title: Fury

text: I couldn't stop thinking about them,with every step and every breath I took.

text: And I didn't believe Katherinewhen she said...
title: Fury

text: Katherine is the young ladywho was going to marry me.
title: Fury

text: Maybe someday afterI've paid for what I did...
title: Fury

text: ...there'll be a chance to begin again.
